Name: Roll Control
About the game: Inspired by games like Super Monkey Ball, Marble Madness and Kamari Darmacy, Roll Control is a 3D balance based platformer, built to be played with your body. Using the Roll Controller App on your mobile device, players can transform their own balance board into a human game controller. Roll Control Can be played in 3 ways; keyboard and mouse, using motion controls on your phone with the Roll Controller app and installed and placing it onto a balance board so you can play by moving your body. This game features : Story mode Infinite roller mode 1 player/ 2 players hotseat multiplayer Level editor Shareable player created levels To play with motion controls using the Roll Controller App, please visit the website in the external links section below.
